concept.title: 47.207 Solicitation provisions, contract clauses, and special requirements.

conbody.p: The contracting officer shall include provisions, clauses, and special requirements in solicitations and contracts for transportation or for transportation-related services as prescribed in 47.207-1 through 47.207-9.
